name: Tagine
description: A traditional Moroccan stew cooked in a conical clay pot.

name: Couscous
description: Steamed semolina served with vegetables, meat, and a flavorful broth.

name: Pastilla
description: A savory-sweet pastry filled with pigeon meat, almonds, and spices.

name: Mechoui
description: Slow-roasted whole lamb seasoned with Moroccan spices.

name: Harira
description: A hearty tomato-based soup with lentils, chickpeas, and herbs.
